verses.verse: Wherefore <S%G3767><s%> laying <S%G659>aside<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2549>malice,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1388>guile,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5272>hypocrisies,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5355>envies,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> evil <S%G2636>speakings,<s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> <S%G738>newborn<s%> <S%G1025>babes,<s%> <S%G1971>desire<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G97>sincere<s%> <S%G1051>milk<s%> of the <S%G3050>word,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may <S%G837>grow<s%> <S%G1722>thereby:<s%> <S%G846><s%>
If so <S%G1512>be<s%> ye have <S%G1089>tasted<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G5543>gracious.<s%>

To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G4334>coming,<s%> as unto a <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G3037>stone,<s%> <S%G593>disallowed<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1588>chosen<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G1784>precious,<s%>

Ye <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2198>lively<s%> <S%G3037>stones,<s%> are built <S%G3618>up<s%> a <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> an <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2406>priesthood,<s%> to offer <S%G399>up<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices,<s%> <S%G2144>acceptable<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> it is <S%G4023>contained<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1124>scripture,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4622>Zion<s%> a chief corner <S%G204>stone,<s%> <S%G3037><s%> <S%G1588>elect,<s%> <S%G1784>precious:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> shall <S%G3364>not<s%> be <S%G2617>confounded.<s%>

Unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> which <S%G4100>believe<s%> he is <S%G5092>precious:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> unto them which be <S%G544>disobedient,<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3618>builders<s%> <S%G593>disallowed,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> is <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1519>the<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G1137>corner,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> a <S%G3037>stone<s%> of <S%G4348>stumbling,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4073>rock<s%> of <S%G4625>offense,<s%> even to them <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4350>stumble<s%> at <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word,<s%> being <S%G544>disobedient:<s%> <S%G1519>whereunto<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> they were <S%G5087>appointed.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> are a <S%G1588>chosen<s%> <S%G1085>generation,<s%> a <S%G934>royal<s%> <S%G2406>priesthood,<s%> a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1484>nation,<s%> a <S%G1519>peculiar<s%> <S%G4047><s%> <S%G2992>people;<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> ye should show <S%G1804>forth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G703>praises<s%> of <S%G3588>him<s%> who hath <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2298>marvelous<s%> light: <S%G5457><s%>

Which <S%G3588><s%> in time <S%G4218>past<s%> were <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> are <S%G3568>now<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> which had not obtained <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> have obtained <S%G1653>mercy.<s%>

Dearly <S%G27>beloved,<s%> I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3941>strangers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3927>pilgrims,<s%> <S%G567>abstain<s%> from <S%G4559>fleshly<s%> <S%G1939>lusts,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G4754>war<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5590>soul;<s%>

Having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> <S%G2570>honest<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles:<s%> <S%G2443>that,<s%> <S%G1722>whereas<s%> <S%G3739><s%> they speak <S%G2635>against<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2555>evildoers,<s%> they may <S%G1537>by<s%> your <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> which they shall <S%G2029>behold,<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G1984>visitation.<s%>

Submit <S%G5293>yourselves<s%> <S%G3767>to<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2937>ordinance<s%> of <S%G442>man<s%> for the Lord's <S%G1223>sake:<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> it be to the <S%G935>king,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5242>supreme;<s%>

Or <S%G1535><s%> unto <S%G2232>governors,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> unto them that are <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G1557>punishment<s%> <S%G3303>of<s%> <S%G2555>evildoers,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> for the <S%G1868>praise<s%> of them that do <S%G17>well.<s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that with well <S%G15>doing<s%> ye may put to <S%G5392>silence<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G56>ignorance<s%> of <S%G878>foolish<s%> men: <S%G444><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> <S%G1658>free,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2192>using<s%> your <S%G1657>liberty<s%> <S%G5613>for<s%> a <S%G1942>cloak<s%> of <S%G2549>maliciousness,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
Honor <S%G5091><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men. <S%G25>Love<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G81>brotherhood.<s%> <S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G5091>Honor<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>king.<s%>

Servants, <S%G3610><s%> be subject <S%G5293>to<s%> your <S%G1203>masters<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5401>fear;<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1933>gentle,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4646>froward.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> is <S%G5485>thankworthy,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> toward <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5297>endure<s%> <S%G3077>grief,<s%> <S%G3958>suffering<s%> <S%G95>wrongfully.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G2811>glory<s%> is it, <S%G1487>if,<s%> when ye be <S%G2852>buffeted<s%> <S%G2532><s%> for your <S%G264>faults,<s%> ye shall take it <S%G5278>patiently?<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1487>if,<s%> when ye do <S%G15>well,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> for it, ye take it <S%G5278>patiently,<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> is <S%G5485>acceptable<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> even <S%G1519>hereunto<s%> <S%G5124><s%> were ye <S%G2564>called:<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G5277>leaving<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> an <S%G5261>example,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye should <S%G1872>follow<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> steps: <S%G2487><s%>
Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> was <S%G1388>guile<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> mouth: <S%G4750><s%>

Who, <S%G3739><s%> when he was <S%G3058>reviled,<s%> reviled not <S%G486>again;<s%> <S%G3756><s%> when he <S%G3958>suffered,<s%> he <S%G546>threatened<s%> <S%G3756>not;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3860>committed<s%> himself to him that <S%G2919>judgeth<s%> righteously: <S%G1346><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> his own <S%G848>self<s%> <S%G399>bare<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> his <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3586>tree,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we, being <S%G581>dead<s%> to <S%G266>sins,<s%> should <S%G2198>live<s%> unto <S%G1343>righteousness:<s%> by <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3468>stripes<s%> ye were <S%G2390>healed.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> going <S%G4105>astray;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> are <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1994>returned<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4166>Shepherd<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1985>Bishop<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls.<s%>
